Plot: In order to wipe out the Gaulish village by any means necessary, Caesar plans to absorb the villagers into Roman culture by having an estate built next to the village to start a new Roman colony.
Title: Asterix and Obelix: Mansion of the Gods
Writer: René Goscinny (comic book), Albert Uderzo (comic book), Alexandre Astier (scenario,  adaptation and dialogue), Louis Clichy (additional dialogue), Jean-Rémi François (collaboration), Philip LaZebnik (collaboration)
Actors: Roger Carel, Lorànt Deutsch, Laurent Lafitte, Alexandre Astier
